alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 13 at 7:16AM PDT until June 13 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Chelan, Badger Mountain Road, Pangborn Airport, Entiat, Cashmere, Waterville, Mansfield, Quincy, Othello, Moses Lake, Number 2 Canyon, Number 1 Canyon, Wenatchee, and Ephrata. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Moses Lake Area; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area
